title: Error building with nightly on Gitpod

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
I'm trying to get [Istio ztunnel](https://github.com/nmittler/ztunnel/tree/gitpod) building on [Gitpod](https://www.gitpod.io/). My Gitpod environment is using this [Docker image](https://github.com/nmittler/ztunnel/blob/gitpod/.gitpod.Dockerfile), which is based on the [Gitpod rust image](https://github.com/gitpod-io/workspace-images/blob/main/chunks/lang-rust/Dockerfile). Running `cargo build` from the Gitpod generates the error below. The project uses features that seem to require nightly rather than stable. ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.67.0-nightly (ff8c8dfbe 2022-11-22) binary: rustc commit-hash: ff8c8dfbe66701531e3e5e335c28c544d0fbc945 commit-date: 2022-11-22 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.67.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.4 ``` ### Error output ``` warning: Error finalizing incremental compilation session directory `/workspace/ztunnel/out/rust/debug/incremental/ztunnel-2fnhaqdc23ksy/s-gfosqlipe3-tu98yj-working`: No such file or directory (os error 2) error: internal compiler error: no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued error: internal compiler error: broken MIR in DropGlue(DefId(2:2801 ~ core[f8fd]::ptr::drop_in_place), Some(hyper::proto::h1::dispatch::Server) -> impl std::future::Future, hyper::error::Error>> {ztunnel::proxy::inbound::Inbound::serve_connect}, hyper::body::body::Body>, hyper::body::body::Body>)) (after phase change to runtime-optimized) at bb0[0]: Field projection `(*_1).field[0]` specified type `std::pin::Pin>>>`, but actual type is `std::pin::Pin) -> impl std::future::Future, hyper::error::Error>> {ztunnel::proxy::inbound::Inbound::serve_connect}, hyper::body::body::Body> as hyper::service::http::HttpService>::Future>>>` | = note: delayed at compiler/rustc_const_eval/src/transform/validate.rs:88:36 thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1594:13 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7fe8b93ddbb0 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h8706adb1093146ed at /rustc/ff8c8dfbe66701531e3e5e335c28c544d0fbc945/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7fe8b93ddbb0 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized::hf63de70ab53f1103 at /rustc/ff8c8dfbe66701531e3e5e335c28c544d0fbc945/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 2: 0x7fe8b93ddbb0 - std::sys_common::backtrace::_print_fmt::h5957d298699ffe59 at /rustc/ff8c8dfbe66701531e3e5e335c28c544d0fbc945/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:65:5 3: 0x7fe8b93ddbb0 - ::fmt::hcd957416de719678 at /rustc/ff8c8dfbe66701531e3e5e335c28c544d0fbc945/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:44:22 4: 0x7fe8b53e565e - core::fmt::write::h984028dcea06bcfd at /rustc/ff8c8dfbe66701531e3e5e335c28c544d0fbc945/library/core/src/fmt/mod.rs:1208:17 5: 0x7fe8b93d1d85 - std::io::Write::write_fmt::he809968620ea8258 at /rustc/ff8c8dfbe66701531e3e5e335c28c544d0fbc945/library/std/src/io/mod.rs:1682:15 6: 0x7fe8b93dd975 - std::sys_common::backtrace::_print::hb0bd3686578e8d46 at /rustc/ff8c8dfbe66701531e3e5e335c28c544d0fbc945/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:47:5 7: 0x7fe8b93dd975 - std::sys_common::backtrace::print::hc5833b565793a292 at /rustc/ff8c8dfbe66701531e3e5e335c28c544d0fbc945/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:34:9 8: 0x7fe8b93dfc8f - std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}::h74c2f33bce600c62 at /rustc/ff8c8dfbe66701531e3e5e335c28c544d0fbc945/library/std/src/panicking.rs:267:22 9: 0x7fe8b93df9ca - as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once::h1b5a13ff0dfa7f2f at /rustc/ff8c8dfbe66701531e3e5e335c28c544d0fbc945/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:2000:9 27: 0x7fe8b93e7733 - as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once::hba33c2ecbf5798cf at /rustc/ff8c8dfbe66701531e3e5e335c28c544d0fbc945/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:2000:9 28: 0x7fe8b93e7733 - clone at /build/glibc-SzIz7B/glibc-2.31/misc/../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:95 31: 0x0 - note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.67.0-nightly (ff8c8dfbe 2022-11-22) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type bin -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental=[REDACTED] note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack ```
